title: Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has not logged in with proper credentials 
AND has completed onboarding as a light user
custom_steps: WHEN the User views the Watch Tab
custom_expected:
Then there will be the following messaging:

“Watch Live Games on MLB.TV - Watch the Free Game of the Day or purchase MLB.TV for more live, out-of-market games”

title: Sign Up Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has not logged in with proper credentials 
AND has completed onboarding as a light user
custom_steps: WHEN the User Navigates to the Watch tab
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a button labeled "Sign Up"
